attributes.background: Heidi Allen has now changed party 3 times since she was elected now joining the lib-dems this is not what we voted for

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs to be sacked.

The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/269912
